title: Gesture Calc for Android Wear
summary: Use gesture to enter calculation formulas. Copy/paste, history, preset functions
description: Gesture Calculator for Android Wear. Tested with Moto 360, SmartWatch3.Features:- Register your own single stroke gesture and use gesture to enter formula.- Calculation history to easy compare results.- Copy / paste data between mobile and wear device. While writing SMS, you can calculate on your write, copy result (and formula), paste to message.- Presets to easily calculate often used formulas.If recognition misses a lot, try changing gesture position, size, direction. You can also use tap instead of stroke.Special Thanks to : Icons8.com for providing nice icons.
descriptionHTML:
Gesture Calculator for Android Wear. Tested with Moto 360, SmartWatch3.

Features:

- Register your own single stroke gesture and use gesture to enter formula.
- Calculation history to easy compare results.
- Copy / paste data between mobile and wear device. While writing SMS, you can calculate on your write, copy result (and formula), paste to message.
- Presets to easily calculate often used formulas.

If recognition misses a lot, try changing gesture position, size, direction. You can also use tap instead of stroke.

Special Thanks to : Icons8.com for providing nice icons.
comments: Only wrote zeros 0000000, moto 360,5.1.1 on a nexus 5, 5.1.1
recentChanges: Fixed app fail when drawing gesture without gesture registered
